concept.title: Installing from Git
concept.shortdesc: It's possible to download and install Swift Mailer directly from github.com if you want to keep up-to-date with ease.

conbody.p: Swift Mailer's source code is kept in a git repository at github.com so you can get the source directly from the repository.
conbody.note: You do not need to have git installed to use Swift Mailer from github. If you don't have git installed, go to and click the "Download" button.
